47408.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「やあ キミは:
Hi, are you a traveler?You must be very strong to come to a place full of tough monsters like this. Me? I'm just
a little painter.I always come to this beach to gather art supplies, but every time I risk my life. Ha-ha-ha-
ha.

47409.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「キミは 旅の:
Are you a traveler? I am a painter.Sometimes I come here to pick up the Rippling Stone, which is the
blue pigment that washes up on this beach. What? You also pick up Rippling Stone?All the way from Port Town
Lendor to make blue letter paper. That's nice, isn't it? If that's the way you want to talk about it, I have
no choice but to cooperate.Okay. As a fellow lover of the arts, I'll share the stones I collected with you.

47410.<pc>は フェルーメから\nさざなみの貴石（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<m:
<pc> received the Rippling
Stone (Key Item) from Ferrume!<me 60>

47412.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「海は いいよ:
The ocean is nice. The sky is nice too. I like blue paint, but no matter how you paint, nothing can compare to
nature.
